title: "Gmail will help you write your emails now: How to access Google's new AI tool"
excerpt: "As Help Me Write is now available for Gmail mobile users in Android and iOS, you have to open your mobile app and start a new message. There should be a button at the bottom right of the screen that says 'Help Me Write'. Tap on it to open the generative AI tool that will generate your email."
